sentence.Network_en: They were as far removed from the ethos of terrorism as you could imagine.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们丝毫不受恐怖主义思潮的影响,这你可以想像到的.

sentence.Network_en: The path he saw himself taking in his research seemed directly opposed to the ethos of the department.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发现自己的研究路线似乎与系里的精神截然不同.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 神气质(ethos).而认知的,存在的方面被称为世界观(world view).一个民族的精神气质是生活格调,特徵和品质,它的道德,审美风格和情绪.
这四条精神气质（ethos）是对希腊所倡导的科学理性精神的一个很好的注解：有条理的怀疑主义是自由的怀疑和批判精神；公有性是 …
但是，使得文化之所以具有一定模式的，是文化的主旋律，这一主旋律，即是民族精神（ethos）。所谓文化的统一形态，就是为民族 …
经典短文背诵--职业道德类 ... portion:n. 部分 ethos:n. 道义，风气 indulge in: 沉湎于.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin, from Greek ēthos 'nature, disposition', (plural) 'customs'

entry.tran: （某一团体或某类活动的）气质，精神特质，风气，思潮
entry.def: An ethos is the set of ideas and attitudes that is associated with a particular group of people or a particular type of activity.

example.ex: The whole ethos of the hotel is effortless service.
example.tran: 该酒店的全部理念就是提供轻松的服务。

means.word_mean: 1. (anthropology) the distinctive spirit of a culture or an era;

auth_sentence.content: The underlying ethos of this album is to Rock out!
auth_sentence.res_content: The underlying ethos of this album is to Rock out!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The underlying ethos of this album is to Rock out!

auth_sentence.content: There was an ethos that rebellions must be crushed militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was an ethos that rebellions must be crushed militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was an ethos that rebellions must be crushed militarily.

auth_sentence.content: It is a persuasive and rather inspiring ethos.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a persuasive and rather inspiring ethos.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a persuasive and rather inspiring ethos.

Sentence.sentence: Corporations in Germany realized that there was an interest to be served economically and patriotically in building up a skilled labor force at home; we never had that ethos (风气)," says Richard Sennett, a New York University sociologist who has written about the connection of craft and culture.

means.word_mean: （某团体或社会的）道德思想，道德观

sentences.cn: 他们丝毫不受恐怖主义思潮的影响,这你可以想像到的。
